name: podamShouldHandleGenericCollectionsInConstructorWithMemoizationEnabled

testSteps.description: Given a Standard Podam Factory with memoization enabled

children.description: Given a Random Data Provider Strategy with memoization set to true

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.issue123.GenericCollectionsConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.Long
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.Integer

title: Podam should correctly handle generic collections in constructor with memoization enabled
